content: are you having a bad day are you looking for something to pick you up then mojo socks are just what you need i have changed the bubbly fun looking pattern that was first published by donyale grant in 2008 into a cuff down pattern with a lovely short row heel to make it easier to get the foot length right also included in the written pattern are instructions for the boomerang heel which is a beautiful reliable short row heel the pattern is written for socks in the size 37 us 6 but there are some tips included on how to knit the socks in other sizes
